entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT , Vernon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:22 AM PST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vernon 08:00 AM PST Saturday 18 February 2023
Temperature: 0.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 87 %
Dewpoint: -1.5°C
Wind: E 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries changing to 40 percent chance of rain showers near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Snow level near valley bottom. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning then 40 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon. Snow level rising to 1000 metres in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 18 February 2023
